snippet: From 1998 to 2001, Kozmo.com offered free delivery within an hour. Now, some online merchants and their delivery partners are inching back toward that vision.
abstract: From 1998 to 2001, Kozmo.com offered free delivery within an hour. Now, some online merchants and their delivery partners are inching back toward that vision.
lead_paragraph: Remember Kozmo.com? From 1998 to 2001, Kozmo.com offered free delivery within an hour. Now, some online merchants and their delivery partners are inching back toward that vision, write Randall Stross in his Digital Domain column in the Sunday New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: A Race Against the Clock, Again, in Package Delivery
